replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
推荐几个科技mod呀，最好是可以弄自动化的qwq

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-24 21:03 编辑 

签名档的整合包不妨试试，楼上的mod全都有了XD

详见：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-783869-1-1.html

推荐主流科技mod：
[超能力]AcademyCraft-1.0.6 https://ac.li-dev.cn[应用能源]appliedenergistics2-rv3-beta-10 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/applied-energistics-2[建筑管道]buildcraft-7.1.23 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/buildcraft[更多实用工具]ExtraUtilities-1.2.12 https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... ities/files/2264383[星系前置]MicdoodleCore-1.7-3.0.12.502 https://micdoodle8.com[星系]GalacticraftCore-1.7-3.0.12.502 https://micdoodle8.com[星系]Galacticraft-Planets-1.7-3.0.12.502 https://micdoodle8.com[星系附属]More-Planets-1.7.10-1.4.3-GC502 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-453885-1-1.html[重力装甲]GraviSuite-1.7.10-2.0.3[TFCN] https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/gravitation-suite[高级太阳能]IC2-Advanced-Solar-Panel-3.4.5 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/advanced-solar-panels[核电控制]IC2NuclearControl-2.4.3a https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/nuclear-control-2[沉浸工程]ImmersiveEngineering-0.7.7 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/immersive-engineering[沉浸工程附属]immersiveintegration-0.6.8 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/immersive-integration[工业2]industrialcraft-2-2.2.817-experimental https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/industrial-craft[舰娘]ShinColle-1.7.10.rv26 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/shincolle[电网前置]Aroma1997Core-1.7.10-1.0.2.16 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/aroma1997core[工业2电网]Uncomplication-1.7.10-0.1.2.1.b77 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/uncomplication
以上链接均为官方发布页，教程还是要你自己去找的~
关于更多科技mod可参见：https://www.mcmod.cn/class/category/1-1.html

科技:
AE2（应用能源2）
IC2（工业时代2）
沉浸
热力
自动化:
更多实用设备
BC管道
植物魔法
生存还是挑战性的，你要哪种类型的mod

replies.author: xjnbb2007
replies.txt_content: AE、工业2、沉浸工程、最主要的还是AE。可以带动各种MOD的自动化
